alert.note: Alert for Allen; Henry; Putnam (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 3:50PM EST until February 27 at 4:15PM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: The National Weather Service in Northern Indiana has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Putnam County in west central Ohio... Southeastern Henry County in northwestern Ohio... Northeastern Allen County in west central Ohio... * Until 415 PM EST. * At 350 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Glandorf to near Columbus Grove, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Leipsic around 355 PM EST. Deshler and Pandora around 400 PM EST. Bluffton around 405 PM EST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Vaughnsville, West Leipsic, Prentiss, Belmore, Gilboa, Rockport and Beaverdam. This includes Interstate 75 between mile markers 136 and 141. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for west central Ohio.
